name: nodes.layoutPositions
descr: Position the nodes for a discrete/synchronous layout.

args.name: function(ele,i)

fields.name: ele
fields.descr: The node being iterated over for which the function should return a position to set.

fields.name: i
fields.descr: The index of the current node while iterating over the nodes in the layout.

args.descr: A function that returns the new position for the specified node.
